name: Sir Knight and the Various Problem' s IV[DEMO EDITION]
name_original: Sir Knight and the Various Problem' s IV[DEMO EDITION]
description:
[This game contains vaguely intense flashing lights and loud noises. Please keep this in mind before choosing to play it!]

[The HTML version displayed above has several slight presentation issues from other versions. If you run into issues or just want the full as intended VARIOUS PROBLEM 'S IV experience, I'd suggest grabbing one of the various downloadable versions below!]

Ever since the dark lord BILLY BOB JOHNS took COMPLETE CONTROL of the kingdom, the dude has made bad decision after bad decision. Now that he's replaced the water supply with FANTA, enough is enough. its time to kick the dudes ass.

Inspired by 2008 era RPG Maker 2003 jokegames and the Yoyo Games sandbox.  Sir Knight and the Various Problem' s IV asks the question "what if your bones were made of chalk and everything killed you?" Explore an INSPIRING world of ABOUT 10 ROOMS and around probably FOUR OR FIVE CHARACTERS.

This is an almost complete demo version and only lacks the final set of rooms and a proper ending. Which I will probably get around to implementing sooner rather than later...probably...

Gamejolt version: https://gamejolt.com/games/SKATVPIV/616700

If you're intrested in this or one of my many other projects, feel free to hit me up on twitter: https://twitter.com/bigbeandotgov
